name: Catalyst Station Sigma
description:
Catalyst Station Sigma is infected.  An extermination order is given. You as a sole exterminator, clear out the pests and make CSS 100% arachnoid-free again.

  • Try to survive in this cutthroat futuristic environment against the spiders.
  •  Be careful as your weapon takes a long time to charge. Save your energy as your weapon becomes stronger.
  • Left-click to shoot, Right-click to dash backwards.

The game might be incomplete or bugged, and we are sorry about that.

A game by

  • Jay Jack
  • JustNick 
  • Arqcenick

Made for BlackThornProd Jam 3.

Theme: "Less is More"

"The less often you shoot your railgun, the more damage you do."

"The less you try to dash backwards with the right mouse button, the more quickly your weapon charges to maximum."

"Less shots fired (one shot) from the right angle as the potential to take out more enemies if you line them up or bounce the beam off walls"
